channel.title: Random Dc problem - Plz Help!
channel.description: Well the server seems to be like dcing random people at times it will dc like 5 people or 10 people or the whole server, or server will get nulled is there anyway someone can help me fix this / have a tut to help me? Would be really helpful for someone to help me. I know its not peoples connections or the vps so thats the best like info i can give you. -Thanks

item.title: Random Dc problem - Plz Help!
item.dc:creator: @Puger12345 Puger12345
item.description:
@Puger12345 wrote:

run3scap3_uk:

Your server is probbly too over-crowded.

ugh what do u mean? atm we only have 40 players online becuase the server keeps nulling itself and dcs random people so we cant get anymore people

Read full topic
